<p><i><b>Prunus emarginata</b></i>, the <b>bitter cherry</b> or <b>Oregon cherry</b>, is a species of <i>Prunus</i> native to western North America, from British Columbia south to Baja California, and east as far as western Wyoming and New Mexico. It is often found in recently disturbed areas or open woods on nutrient-rich soil.
